title: The Creative person: Tyrone Guthrie
creator_credit: Joyce Chopra and National Educational Television
brief_description: A profile of Tyrone Guthrie the eminent theatrical director, showing him in several locales while he works, lectures and relaxes. In interviews he discusses his general philosophy towards the theatre as a medium. June Havoc and Darren McGavin describe the feelings which most actors have towards working with Guthrie.
